title: Catalan Separatist Leaders Sentenced for 2017 Independence Referendum
text:
Spain’s highest court sentenced nine Catalan separatist leaders to between nine and 13 years in jail for their role in an illegal independence referendum, a sentence likely to trigger protests and play a central role in Spain’s national elections next month.

The jailed leaders, who include former members of Catalonia’s regional government and Parliament as well as political activists, were found guilty of sedition on Monday. Some of them were also found guilty of misappropriating public funds by organizing the unauthorized...
description: Spain’s highest court sentenced nine Catalan separatist leaders to between nine and 13 years in jail for their role in an illegal independence referendum, a sentence likely to trigger protests and play a central role in Spain’s national elections next month.
